description:
Mailpile

Mailpile is a Free Software project to build a modern e-mail client and which improves user privacy and challenges the dominance of the proprietary web-mail solutions. The project places a large emphasis on usability and attempting to make OpenPGP encryption accessible to non-technical users. This talk will introduce the project and summarize the progress made since it launched in August 2013.

Download video: http://videos.fscons.org/fscons/2013/c444_-_2013-11-09_1715_-_mailpile_-_bjarni_einarsson_-_49.ogv
